agentDefaultMessage: Hello, I am **{{name}}**. You can start a conversation with me right away, or you can go to [Assistant Settings]({{url}}) to complete my information.

artifact.inThread: Cannot view in subtopic, please switch to the main conversation area to open

confirmClearCurrentMessages: You are about to clear the current session messages. Once cleared, they cannot be retrieved. Please confirm your action.
confirmRemoveSessionItemAlert: You are about to delete this assistant. Once deleted, it cannot be retrieved. Please confirm your action.

disableContextCaching.desc: The cost of generating a single conversation can be reduced by up to 90%, and the response speed is increased by 4 times (<1>Learn more</1>). Enabling this will automatically disable the limit on the number of historical messages.
disableContextCaching.title: Enable Context Caching

enableReasoning.desc: Based on the Claude Thinking mechanism limit (<1>Learn more</1>), enabling this will automatically disable the limit on the number of historical messages.
enableReasoning.title: Enable Deep Thinking

history.title: The assistant will only remember the last {{count}} messages.

inbox.desc: Activate the brain cluster and spark creative thinking. Your virtual assistant is here to communicate with you about everything.
inbox.title: Just Chat

knowledgeBase.disabled: The current deployment mode does not support knowledge base conversations. To use this feature, please switch to server-side database deployment or use the {{cloud}} service.
knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.uploadGuide: Uploaded files can be viewed in the 'Knowledge Base'.

messageAction.deleteDisabledByThreads: There are subtopics, deletion is not allowed

modelCard.creditTooltip: For counting purposes, we convert $1 to 1M credits; for example, $3/M tokens can be converted to 3 credits/token.

auto.desc: Intelligently determine whether a search is needed based on the conversation content
auto.title: Smart Online Search

off.desc: Use only the model's basic knowledge without performing a web search
off.title: Disable Online Search

on.desc: Continuously perform web searches to obtain the latest information
on.title: Always Online

mode.useModelBuiltin: Use the model's built-in search engine

searchModel.desc: The current model does not support function calls, so it needs to be paired with a model that does support function calls for online searching.
searchModel.title: Search Assistant Model

sessionGroup.confirmRemoveGroupAlert: This group is about to be deleted. After deletion, the assistants in this group will be moved to the default list. Please confirm your operation.
sessionGroup.tooLong: Group name length should be between 1-20

topic.checkSaveCurrentMessages: Do you want to save the current conversation as a topic?

action.imageDisabled: The current model does not support visual recognition. Please switch models to use this feature.

clientMode.disabled: The current model does not support visual recognition and file analysis. Please switch models to use this feature.
